episodes.title: REBUILDING & REDISCOVERING: My Life After Cult|Failed Marriage|Furthering My Studies|New Beginnings.
episodes.description:
Hey guys

Join me as I share my journey of healing and growth after leaving a cult. From navigating a failed marriage to pursuing higher education, I’m embracing new beginnings and sharing my experiences with you. Get ready for real talk, lifestyle vlogs and a dash of faith. I love you all! Please don’t forget to subscribe, like, share, comment and hit the notification bell to be notified whenever I post. ❤️

Shot by : Myself 
Edited & directed by: @ayavuyajones_ on all social networks 

Please follow me on these social media platforms below:

Facebook: @Noludwe Simanga 
Instagram: @Noludwe
TikTok: @Noludwe Simanga                                              Music : Rio de Janerio                                                          Musician: EnjoyMusic
Site: https://enjoymusic.ai

episodes.title: My testimony: CULT leaders arranged marriage + How the I ended REmarrying my husband from the cult
episodes.description:
Hey everyone 
Welcome back to my channel. Thank you for the outpouring of love. This is my story and the goal is to share this story so that I can help as many people as possible. God saved me and I believe He will save you too. 

I share my story of how the cult leaders arranged a marriage with a fellow believer who I had no interest in and how we ended up leaving the cult and decided to get married on our own terms. 

Please check out Isabel Sibuyi Channel
She edits & shoots my content for me

Isabel Sibuyi
https://www.youtube.com/@isabelsibuyi

episodes.title: My Cape Town Cult story|How I was recruited to a cult unknowingly 😱
episodes.description:
#cultsurvivor #southafrica #godisgoodallthetime 
Hi, My name is Noludwe Ncethelo. I am from Paarl in the Western Cape

I am here to share my story of how I got recruited to a cult, forced to get married and fell pregnant in the process. I tell my story mostly in IsiXhosa. I hope you enjoy it

God bless you 🙏🏾


Shot & Edited by: Isabel Sibuyi
